snippet: A two-inch plastic gas pipe ruptured in San Bruno, the same San Francisco suburb where a pipeline blast killed eight people in 2010, and more than a dozen homes were briefly evacuated.
abstract: Two-inch plastic gas pipe ruptures in San Bruno, Calif, the same San Francisco suburb where a pipeline blast killed eight people in 2010, and more than a dozen homes are briefly evacuated.
lead_paragraph: A two-inch plastic gas pipe ruptured in San Bruno, the same San Francisco suburb where a pipeline blast killed eight people in 2010, and more than a dozen homes were briefly evacuated.

headline.main: California: Gas Pipe Breaks Near Site of Fatal Explosion
headline.print_headline: California: Gas Pipe Breaks Near Site of Fatal Explosion
